venue.name: Your local police and fire station

item.description:
In commemoration of the 10th anniversary of 9/11, the Western MA 912 Project will be sponsoring and coordinating various rallies at local police and fire stations in the area. Please consider this in your hometown if you cannot join us here in Western MA!

Details on visits to Agawam, West Springfield and Springfield police and fire stations:

For any and all who are interested,
We will be meeting at the Fire Station on Main St in Agawam at 1pm. From there, we will be working our way down the street to the police station. After Agawam, the Fire/Police complex on Van Deene St is the next in line, probably about 2:15 or so. From there we can play it by ear but hopefully make it to the Fire/police complex in Chicopee and Springfield. Come to one or all , whatever works for you!
Donna
item.name: "Never Forget" our First Responders
